node_0_2_2_2_2_1_2_1_2_2.story: The forbidden technique proves too potent. As you attempt to sever the connection, a backlash of dark energy surges through you. The Sith Lord is not redeemed but shattered, their consciousness scattered, creating a void. Tython is freed, but at the cost of your innocence and part of your soul. Now, the lingering traces of the Sith Lord's darkness whisper in your mind, a constant reminder of the power you wielded and the darkness you embraced.

Cantina Patron.description: A mysterious individual nursing a drink

node_0_2_2_2_2_1_2_2_1_1.story: The Force Wave erupts, a blinding torrent of energy that tears through the Sith Lord's defenses. Their connection to the dark side, once an unyielding fortress, shatters like glass. Exhausted but victorious, you stand over their broken form, a choice before you: mercy, or final judgment. Whichever path you choose, the battle for Tython is over, and the fate of the Jedi Order hangs in the balance, resting on the choices you will make in the coming galactic conflict.

Cantina Patron.description: A mysterious individual nursing a drink

node_0_2_2_2_2_1_2_2_1_2.story: The unleashed Force Wave decimates the Sith Master, but the raw power leaves you reeling, teetering on the edge of the dark side. The Tython Covenant resonates with the surge, its ancient power now irrevocably intertwined with your own fractured state. Victory is yours, but at what cost? The lingering darkness threatens to consume you, forever changing the balance of the Force and your place within it.

Imperial Officer.description: A stern officer in a gray uniform

node_0_2_2_2_2_1_2_2_2_1.story: With a surge of will, the Force bond shatters. The Master, once radiant with the Covenant's power, collapses, their deceptions laid bare. The remaining Jedi, witnessing the fallen idol and the now-flickering Covenant, grapple with the implications. A new era dawns, one where trust is earned, not blindly given, and the Jedi Order, though scarred, has a chance to rebuild on a foundation of truth, free from the manipulative influence of the Covenant.

Rebel Scout.description: A dedicated fighter for the rebellion

node_0_2_2_2_2_1_2_2_2_2.story: The severed connection echoes across Tython, the Covenant's light dimming significantly. The Master, stripped of their power, lashes out in desperation, revealing a long-hidden Sith allegiance. The ensuing chaos forces the remaining Jedi to confront not only the Master's treachery but also the inherent dangers of relying on external power. Though victory is achieved, the Jedi Order is forever fractured, some seeking a purer path, others consumed by the desire for control now that the established hierarchy is gone.

Cantina Patron.description: A mysterious individual nursing a drink

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_1_1_1_1.story: The echoes of the sacrifice resonated through the Force, a dull ache reminding you of what was lost, yet Tython pulsed with renewed Light. The Separatist fleet scattered, their Sith Lord vanquished, their assault broken against the Covenant's shield. Though diminished, you remained, a beacon of resilience, forever bound to Tython, guiding a new generation of Jedi tempered by loss, their powers honed by understanding the cost of true protection, ensuring that the mistakes of the past would never be repeated as the Order rises from the ashes, forever changed.

Cantina Patron.description: A mysterious individual nursing a drink

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_1_1_1_2.story: With a searing pain, the connection shattered, a vital part of you fading as the Tython Covenant roared to life. Separatist forces were routed, their influence banished from Tython forever, but you stood, forever scarred. While the Order remained fractured and diminished, your wisdom was sought by Jedi and Sith alike and Tython became a safe place for all. Your sacrifice bought them time, the chance to build a new foundation in the Force, one founded on understanding the cost of power.

Rebel Scout.description: A dedicated fighter for the rebellion

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_1_1_2_1.story: The Covenant buckles under the weight of your ambition, its radiant energy twisting into a vortex of dark power. Separatist forces crumble before you, their ships falling from the sky like shattered stars. Tython is yours, remade in your image as a bastion of the Dark Side, yet the haunting visions remain, a constant reminder that even ultimate power cannot quell the unease within.

Rebel Scout.description: A dedicated fighter for the rebellion

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_1_1_2_2.story: You seize control of the Covenant's dark energy, your fear and rage fueling an unprecedented surge of power. The Separatist fleet is decimated, Tython secured, but the victory comes at a terrible cost. The Light within you flickers and dies, leaving behind a cold, calculating Dark Lord, forever bound to the corrupted Covenant and destined to rule a galaxy trembling in fear.

inventory_changes.add: Memento of the Star Wars Conclusion

Rebel Scout.description: A dedicated fighter for the rebellion

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_1_2_1_1.story: The clash with the Sith Lord was cataclysmic, a whirlwind of light and darkness. Though victorious, the player Knight emerged battered and weakened, just as the Separatist fleet broke through the Temple's defenses. But their sacrifice bought the Jedi Council the precious time they needed; the Tython Covenant resonated, shielding the Temple and repelling the invaders, a beacon of hope ignited in the darkening galaxy.

inventory_changes.add: Memento of the Star Wars Conclusion

Rebel Scout.description: A dedicated fighter for the rebellion

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_1_2_1_2.story: The Sith Lord fell, but the cost was immense. The strike force decimated, and the Separatist fleet descended like vultures. Yet, the Knight's desperate gamble paid off in an unexpected way – the sheer ferocity of their defiance, amplified by Tython's unique Force energy, triggered a premature, uncontrolled activation of the Covenant. The Separatist fleet was scattered, but the unleashed power ravaged Tython, leaving the fate of the Temple, and the Order, uncertain amidst the chaos.

Rebel Scout.description: A dedicated fighter for the rebellion

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_1_2_2_1.story: The ritual began, but the Separatist leader, sensing the shift in the Force, arrived before its completion. Facing the Sith Lord weakened from the initial battle, and fueled by the encroaching darkness should the ritual fail, the player made the ultimate sacrifice, channeling their life force to fully awaken the Covenant. Tython was bathed in light, the Separatist forces routed, but the Jedi Order mourned the loss of a hero, unaware that the Covenant's shield would protect them from a far greater darkness yet to come.

inventory_changes.add: Memento of the Star Wars Conclusion

Cantina Patron.description: A mysterious individual nursing a drink

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_1_2_2_2.story: The Covenant ritual resonated, pushing back the immediate Separatist threat, but the Jedi Council, arriving late, saw not salvation but heresy. Though Tython was secure, the Council branded the player a rogue Jedi, acting outside their authority and endangering the Order. Now an exile, the player was left to guide the Tython Covenant alone, a beacon of hope against the coming darkness, forever separated from the Order they sought to save, forging their own path towards an uncertain future.

Cantina Patron.description: A mysterious individual nursing a drink

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_2_1_1_1.story: With a final surge of will, you unleash the last of your Force energy. The blast strikes true, severing the Sith Lord's connection to Tython and releasing a wave of pure Light. As the Covenant's energy washes over the planet, the darkness recedes, and the Separatist forces are routed, but the cost is steep; your connection to the Force fades entirely, leaving you a guardian of Tython, forever watching over the restored Jedi Temple, a silent sentinel who sacrificed everything to usher in an era of peace.

Rebel Scout.description: A dedicated fighter for the rebellion

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_2_1_1_2.story: The focused strike lands, disrupting the Sith Lord's anchor to the planet and unleashing the Tython Covenant. A blinding surge of light engulfs the battlefield, vaporizing the remaining Separatist forces and purifying the corrupted lands. Though victorious, the exertion proves fatal. As your life ebbs away, you see the Jedi Temple bathed in golden light, a beacon of hope restored to the galaxy, a testament to your sacrifice and the enduring power of the Light Side, giving the Republic a chance.

inventory_changes.add: Memento of the Star Wars Conclusion

Imperial Officer.description: A stern officer in a gray uniform

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_2_1_2_1.story: With a final surge of will, you become one with the Tython Covenant. A blinding wave of pure Force energy erupts from your being, obliterating the Sith Lord and scattering the Separatist fleet like dust in the wind. Tython is safe, but your light fades, becoming a legend whispered among the Jedi, a testament to the ultimate sacrifice for the greater good, forever bound to the very planet you saved.

Cantina Patron.description: A mysterious individual nursing a drink

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_2_1_2_2.story: The ancient power courses through you, a torrent threatening to overwhelm your very essence. Yet, you hold firm, channeling the Covenant's energy with unwavering resolve. The Sith Lord is vanquished, their fleet scattered, but the strain is immense; your physical form crumbles as you become a Force ghost, forever guarding Tython, a silent sentinel against future threats, your sacrifice ensuring the Jedi Order has a chance to rise again.

Rebel Scout.description: A dedicated fighter for the rebellion

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_2_2_1_1.story: The Force Storm consumed Tython, leaving a wasteland of twisted energy and shattered faith. From the ashes rose a new power, a nexus of darkness radiating across the galaxy, beckoning those hungry for power and vengeance. The Old Republic trembled, unaware that its true enemy wasn't the Separatists, but the shadow cast by a fallen Jedi ruling over the ruined cradle of their Order.

Imperial Officer.description: A stern officer in a gray uniform

Cantina Patron.description: A mysterious individual nursing a drink

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_2_2_1_2.story: Tython became a monument to the Jedi's failure. As the storm subsided, the new Sith Lord surveyed their domain, a twisted mirror reflecting the Light's hubris. But even in victory, a nagging doubt lingered. Had the destruction truly brought power, or simply proven that darkness, unchecked, consumes everything, even its master?

inventory_changes.add: Memento of the Star Wars Conclusion

Cantina Patron.description: A mysterious individual nursing a drink

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_2_2_2_1.story: The Republic crumbled before the might of the Tython Sith. World after world fell, not to Separatist ideals, but to the promise of power and the chilling efficiency of a master strategist wielding the Force like a weapon. The galaxy, once illuminated by the light of the Jedi, now shuddered under the shadow of a new Sith Empire, its capital firmly established on the corrupted nexus of Tython.

Imperial Officer.description: A stern officer in a gray uniform

node_0_2_2_2_2_2_2_2_2_2.story: Victory seemed assured as the Separatist fleet ravaged the Republic, but the Force, ever seeking balance, intervened. A hidden cadre of Jedi Knights, empowered by the sacrifices made to awaken the Tython Covenant years prior, launched a desperate counter-offensive. As they arrived on Tython to confront the new Sith Lord, the very ground beneath their feet shifted, the planet itself rejecting the dark influence and setting the stage for a final, galaxy-altering clash between light and shadow.

Imperial Officer.description: A stern officer in a gray uniform

edges.action: Focus on defending the Temple against the Separatist assault and trust the Jedi Council
Investigate Master Vrook's actions and the meaning of your visions, despite the ongoing attack
Rally the Padawans: Organize the Temple's remaining Padawans to defend the western gate, using your lightsaber to cut down droids and bolster their courage against the Separatist onslaught.

Reinforce the Masters: Rush to aid the Jedi Masters engaged in a desperate battle against the mysterious Sith Lord near the Temple's main entrance, risking direct confrontation with a powerful enemy to protect the Order's leaders.

Confront Master Vrook: Immediately interrupt Master Vrook and demand an explanation for his suspicious behavior during the Separatist attack, risking direct insubordination and potential conflict with a respected Jedi Master.

Investigate the Hidden Chamber: Disregard the immediate battle raging above and venture deeper into the newly discovered hidden chamber beneath the Temple, hoping to uncover clues about the Tython Covenant and your visions before the Separatists can exploit this vulnerability.
Charge forward, deflecting blaster fire and inspiring the Padawans with a powerful Force wave to momentarily stun the advancing droids, creating an opening for a counter-attack.

Focus on tactical defense, using the Force to create a protective barrier around the Padawans while strategically directing their blaster fire towards vulnerable points in the droid ranks, maximizing their limited ammunition.
Charge Headlong: Ignite your lightsaber and sprint towards the sounds of battle, directly engaging the Sith Lord to protect the Jedi Masters, regardless of the personal risk.

Assess and Defend: Briefly analyze the battleground to identify the Sith Lord's weaknesses and the Masters' vulnerabilities, then strategically position yourself to intercept incoming attacks and create an opening for a coordinated counter-offensive.

Press Vrook for Answers: Confront Master Vrook directly, accusing him of aiding the Separatists and demanding he reveal his motives, even if it means facing his considerable power and risking expulsion from the Order.

Silently Investigate: Conceal your suspicions from Master Vrook and discretely begin gathering evidence to support your claims, using your Force abilities to search for clues within his quarters and past records, aware that your actions could be construed as spying and treason.
Decipher the Holocron: Activate the ancient Jedi Holocron found in the chamber and attempt to access its knowledge about the Tython Covenant, risking potential mental intrusion or dangerous secrets.

Search for Security Measures: Ignore the Holocron for now and meticulously examine the chamber's walls and floor for hidden defenses or traps, prioritizing your safety and preventing potential ambushes.
Leap onto a Destroyer Droid, disrupting its targeting systems while channeling the Force to overload its power core, creating a chain reaction among the advancing Separatist ranks.

Focus on the suspected Jedi traitor, using a Force Persuasion to break through their mental barriers and reveal their true intentions, potentially turning them against the Separatists and shifting the tide of battle.

Surge forward, using Force Speed to break through the droid ranks and target the Separatist commander controlling the assault, hoping to disrupt their strategy and create an opening for the remaining Jedi.

Reinforce the barrier, drawing upon the Tython Covenant energy, channeling your Force power to amplify the protective shield and unleash a Force wave that disrupts the droid's targeting systems, buying time for the surviving Jedi to formulate a counter-attack.
Leap and Intercept: Channel the Force to leap between the Sith Lord and a wounded Jedi Master, deflecting a lethal blow with your lightsaber and creating an opening for a counter-attack.
Exploit Weakness: Focus on the Sith Lord's fighting style and channel the dark side energy around you to use force lightning on the Sith Lord to give the Jedi masters time to regroup and escape.

Channel Force Barrier: Focus your energy to create a protective barrier around the most vulnerable Jedi Masters, diverting the Sith Lord's attacks and buying them precious time to recover and regroup.

Exploit Weakness: Observe the Sith Lord's fighting style closely, identifying a pattern in their movements and a brief opening after each powerful attack. Prepare to launch a swift counter-offensive, targeting that vulnerability with a concentrated Force strike.

Unleash Force Lightning and demand Vrook answers immediately: Bypass diplomacy, channeling your mounting frustration into a raw display of power to intimidate Vrook into revealing his secrets. Risk succumbing to the Dark Side and permanently damaging your relationship with the Jedi Order.

Use Force Persuasion and seek to understand: Attempt a subtler approach, employing Force Persuasion to delve into Vrook's mind. Uncover his true intentions without resorting to violence, potentially finding common ground or revealing a hidden threat. Risk being deceived or overpowered by Vrook's mental defenses.

Employ Force Sense: Focus your Force abilities to delve into Master Vrook's past, attempting to uncover hidden memories or lingering emotions that might betray his true allegiance. Risk: attracting unwanted attention from other Jedi Masters or inadvertently stumbling upon dangerous Sith residue, potentially influencing your alignment.

Decipher Encrypted Records: Attempt to break into the Jedi Archives' restricted databanks, specifically targeting records relating to Vrook's previous missions and assignments. Risk: Triggering security protocols that alert the Jedi Council, or finding information that implicates other Jedi, forcing you to make difficult decisions about who to trust.

Focus your mind and directly interface with the Holocron, attempting to bypass its security protocols for immediate access to its core knowledge, risking mental corruption or triggering hidden defense mechanisms.

Carefully calibrate your lightsaber to resonate with the Holocron's frequency, using it as a key to unlock the device's secrets indirectly, hoping to glean information safely while potentially triggering unforeseen energy surges or damaging the artifact.
Focus your senses to detect Force Imprints, meticulously scanning the chamber for residual energies that might indicate hidden mechanisms or wards.
Systematically tap along the walls, listening for hollow sounds while simultaneously using the Force to probe for structural anomalies and hidden compartments.

Leap off the Droid and direct the Force explosion: Focus your Force powers to channel the imminent explosion, directing the concussive blast and shrapnel towards a critical Separatist artillery emplacement further down the line, sacrificing precision for a massive area-of-effect strike.

Ride the explosion and assassinate the Sith Commander: Maintain your grip on the disintegrating Destroyer Droid, using the Force to protect yourself from the worst of the blast while riding the wave of destruction directly towards the Separatist commander's position, gambling on a surprise assassination attempt amidst the chaos.

Initiate a Force Vision Walk with the Suspect: Link your minds, guiding them through a reliving of their key moments, searching for the source of their conflict and potential manipulation. This could expose the true Sith influence or reveal a hidden noble purpose, but risks overwhelming their mind or backfiring if they are a skilled Force user.

Unleash a Force Wave of Truth: Channel the Force to create a powerful burst of energy designed to shatter mental blocks and force the Suspect to confront their true intentions. This direct approach bypasses subtlety, potentially revealing their alignment immediately. However, it risks causing permanent mental damage if they are innocent or have been subtly influenced, and it may trigger a powerful defensive reaction.
Unleash a Force Wave, channeling the raw energy of Tython to disrupt the droid ranks and create a path directly to the Separatist commander, while risking exposing yourself to heavy blaster fire.
Employ Force Confusion on the Separatist Commander, planting seeds of doubt and discord within his mind, hoping to turn his droid forces against each other and buy the Jedi time to regroup.

Unleash a Force Tempest: Focus all your energy into a concentrated Force tempest, targeting the lead Separatist heavy droid and attempting to tear it apart from the inside out, creating a breach in their line.

Sacrifice Personal Connection: Sever your strongest emotional bond—a memory of your mentor, a lingering attachment to a lost love—to fuel the Tython Covenant. Empowered, the barrier flares with unprecedented strength, incinerating approaching droids and bolstering the Jedi defenses.

Unleash a Force Wave: Channel the raw power of the Force, blasting the Sith Lord backward and disrupting their concentration, potentially creating a window for the Master to escape or launch a follow-up attack. Prepare for the Sith Lord's counter-attack and to be potentially unbalanced.

Execute a Daring Lightsaber Duel: Launch a whirlwind offensive, pressing the Sith Lord with a flurry of rapid strikes and acrobatic maneuvers. Overwhelm their defenses and aim to disarm or incapacitate them, demonstrating your skill and aggression in combat. Beware the Sith Lord's power and speed.

Unleash Force Lightning: Channel the raw, chaotic energy of Tython's dark side nexus and unleash a concentrated blast of Force lightning directly at the Sith Lord, aiming to overwhelm their defenses and create an opening for the Jedi Masters' retreat.

Weave a Force Barrier: Draw upon the Force and create a complex barrier around the Sith Lord, attempting to trap them within a cage of pure energy. This will not harm them directly, but will hopefully delay their pursuit and give the Jedi Masters the time needed to escape the temple.

Amplify Barrier, risking all: Pour every ounce of your Force energy into the barrier, creating an impenetrable shield but leaving yourself completely vulnerable to attack once it collapses. The Jedi Masters gain precious time to counter-attack, but you risk being overwhelmed when the barrier fails.

Weaken Barrier, aiding the Jedi: Allow portions of the Sith Lord's attacks to pass through the barrier, strategically targeting weakened areas of the Temple and specific Separatist droids, effectively turning the Sith's attacks against his own forces. This weakens the barrier protecting the Jedi Masters, but provides an opening for a focused counter-attack and disrupts the Separatist advance.

Exploit Opening: Channel the Force into a burst of blinding light, targeting the Sith Lord's vulnerable moment after their next power attack. Follow up with a disarming strike aimed at their lightsaber hilt.

Weaken Nexus: Focus your Force energy on disrupting the ancient Sith nexus powering the Lord. Disrupting the nexus will greatly weaken them, but risk a counter-strike that can corrupt you with the Dark Side.

Unleash a torrent of Force Lightning at Vrook, ignoring the Jedi Code. Demand he reveal what he knows about the Tython Covenant and his suspected betrayal, threatening to incapacitate him if he resists.

Discharge a controlled burst of Force Lightning near Vrook, a warning shot to emphasize the urgency of your demand. Maintain a semblance of control, reiterating your need for answers regarding the Covenant and his suspicious actions during the Separatist attack, promising leniency if he cooperates fully.

Concentrate your Force Persuasion: Focus your mind to subtly influence Master Vrook's thoughts, probing his recent actions and loyalties, searching for truth behind his possible betrayal, despite the inherent risks of mental manipulation and the potential backlash should he resist.

Project a Vision of the Future: Using the Force, craft a vision of the future, showing Vrook the potential consequences of his actions - both the success he envisions and the dark path it might lead down, hoping to sway him through foresight rather than direct mental intrusion, risking his rejection of the vision or misinterpretation of its meaning.

Reach out directly to Master Vrook's mind, attempting a deep Force probe to discern his intentions and expose any hidden Sith influence. Risk: Permanent mental scarring to yourself and the possibility of Vrook detecting your intrusion, leading to a confrontation.

Search Vrook's personal quarters discreetly, using the Force to guide your movements and conceal your presence, looking for any physical evidence linking him to the Separatists or the Sith. Risk: Discovery by Vrook or another Jedi, leading to accusations of treachery and potentially expulsion from the Order.

Override Security Protocols: Initiate a full system override of the Archives' security, bypassing individual file encryption but risking a complete lockdown and immediate Jedi Council alert. Focus on speed to extract the crucial data on Vrook's activities before detection.

Isolate and Decrypt Individual Files: Utilize advanced decryption algorithms and precise intrusion techniques to target specific files related to Vrook's missions, minimizing the risk of a system-wide alert but requiring significantly more time and precision. Focus on stealth and efficiency.
Forcefully override the Holocron's safeguards, channeling raw Force energy to crack its encryption matrix and seize its secrets, regardless of the mental strain.

Attempt a delicate mental meld with the Holocron, patiently resonating with its energy signature to understand its language and unlock its knowledge through empathy and understanding, hoping to avoid triggering its defenses.

Push the Lightsaber's Resonance: Increase the frequency calibration, focusing the energy to overload the Holocron's defenses and force an immediate data download, risking permanent damage to both the Holocron and your lightsaber.

Stabilize the Connection: Reduce the frequency calibration, carefully aligning your lightsaber's energy with the Holocron's harmonics to create a stable, sustained connection, allowing for a gradual and controlled data extraction, potentially revealing deeper secrets but requiring more time and concentration.
Focus all your energy into reaching out to the Force, heedless of the potential dangers, and search for any residue of the Tython Covenant's power, or even a glimpse of the 'chosen one' it speaks of.
Methodically examine the walls, floor, and ceiling of the hidden chamber, using your lightsaber to probe for weaknesses and search for any indication of a trigger mechanism or hidden compartment.
Focus your Force senses on the suspected traitor, attempting to discern their true intentions and any immediate plans, even if it risks alerting them to your presence. If a Sith, eliminate them now.

Cease the search and immediately report your findings regarding the Tython Covenant to the remaining Jedi Council members, urging them to prioritize its reawakening despite the ongoing Separatist threat. If they are dismissive, abandon the Jedi and seek the Covenant yourself.

Ride the Blast and Strike! Gather your remaining Force energy, channeling it into a protective bubble as you ride the wave of the directed explosion. Aim to land amidst the remaining Separatist infantry, disrupting their formation and sowing chaos with your lightsaber.

Sever the Connection and Recede! Realizing the danger of such a raw, uncontrolled Force expenditure, attempt to sever your connection to the exploding droid at the last possible moment. Use a Force Push to propel yourself away from the blast zone, seeking cover behind a crumbling wall of the Jedi Temple. Conserve your energy and assess the situation before committing to a further engagement.

Leap: Abandon the collapsing Destroyer Droid prematurely, using the Force to propel yourself towards the commander, sacrificing control for speed and risking exposure to debris but gaining the element of surprise.

Focus: Channel the Force to perfectly time your exit, using the explosion's energy to mask your approach and enhance your perception, ensuring a precise strike but potentially arriving too late to catch the commander off guard.
Submerge your will: Dive deep into the suspect's memories, aggressively seeking the source of corruption, risking mental backlash for both of you.
Guide with empathy: Gently guide the suspect through their memories, focusing on their emotions and offering support, hoping to uncover the truth through understanding and compassion.

Unleash the Force Wave: Focus all your energy, channeling the Force into a concentrated wave aimed directly at the Suspect's mind. Prepare for a potentially violent psychic backlash, and steel yourself against any mental defenses they may erect.

Attempt a Mind Meld: Gently reach out with the Force, attempting a Mind Meld with the Suspect. Tread carefully, seeking to understand their motivations and uncover the source of their actions without force. This is a delicate process, requiring patience and empathy, but could provide invaluable insight without causing lasting harm.

Charge forward, lightsaber blazing, deflecting blaster fire while using Force Speed to close the distance to the Separatist commander, relying on your agility and precision to overwhelm their defenses.

Summon a Force Barrier, reinforcing it with Tython's energy to create a temporary shield against the blaster fire, then strategically retreat towards a ruined structure, using it as cover to analyze the commander's tactics and identify a weakness in their formation.

Deepen the Confusion: Focus all your Force energy on amplifying the implanted suggestions, attempting to override the Separatist Commander's core programming and force him to order a full retreat, sowing chaos amongst his ranks.

Exploit the Chaos: Abandon the Force Confusion and capitalize on the immediate disruption. Launch a direct assault on the Separatist Commander, using the droids' infighting as cover to close the distance and neutralize him before he can regain control.
Channel the Tempest: Unleash the full Force Tempest, ignoring the risk to nearby Jedi. Focus every ounce of your power to obliterate the lead droid, even if it means collateral damage.

Redirect the Tempest: Quickly adjust the Force Tempest to minimize harm to the Jedi, sacrificing some of its raw power to protect your allies. Aim to disable, not destroy, the lead droid while creating a smaller, more controlled breach.

Focus the Covenant's Energy: Channel the raw power now surging through the Tython Covenant directly into your lightsaber, creating a blade of pure Force energy capable of piercing the Sith Lord's defenses, but risking severe feedback.

Bolster the Defenses: Redirect the Tython Covenant's enhanced protective field, creating localized pockets of impenetrable energy around key Jedi defenders to strengthen the Jedi's defense line. Sacrificing your personal attack, you empower the overall fight.

Leap over the collapsing debris towards the trapped Master, using Force Speed to create a diversion for the Sith Lord, while leaving yourself vulnerable to their attack, giving you a chance to free him, but risking a fatal blow.

Focus your mind to sever the Sith Lord's connection to the Dark Side nexus on Tython, attempting to weaken their powers and potentially disrupt the ritual they are performing, risking the Sith Lord unleashing all of their pent up rage towards you and the Master.
Unleash a Force Push: Anticipate the Sith Lord's next strike and unleash a concentrated Force Push, disrupting their balance and creating an opening for a decisive lightsaber strike.

Focus on Defensive Mastery: Abandon the offensive and adopt a Soresu stance, deflecting the Sith Lord's attacks with precision and patience. Observe their fighting style, seeking a weakness in their technique or an opening to exploit.

Overload the Nexus: Redirect the Force Lightning into the Tython nexus itself, creating a feedback loop of dark energy. This will amplify the lightning's power, potentially crippling the Sith Lord, but risking a catastrophic surge that could damage the Temple further and corrupt your own connection to the Light.

Sever the Connection: Rather than directly attacking, focus your Force Lightning on the Sith Lord's connection to the Force. Aim to disrupt their ability to channel the dark side, weakening their powers and potentially severing their link to the Separatist command. This may not deliver a fatal blow, but could buy precious time for the Jedi Masters to escape and regroup.

Channel Raw Power: Focus all your energy into a brute-force Force Barrier, sacrificing precision for sheer strength. Risk: This may drain your reserves and leave you vulnerable to follow-up attacks, but it’s the fastest way to contain the Sith.

Weave a Disruptive Field: Combine the Force Barrier with a field of disruptive energy, targeting the Sith Lord's connection to the Force. Risk: This requires delicate control and precision, potentially failing to contain the Sith at all, but if successful, it could significantly weaken their abilities.

Maintain Barrier, Draw Aggro: Focus on reinforcing the barrier, taunting the Separatist forces to direct their attacks solely at you. This buys more time for the Jedi Masters, but ensures you are the primary target when the barrier inevitably fails, facing overwhelming odds alone.

Shatter Barrier, Unleash Counter-Attack: Voluntarily collapse the barrier, using the released Force energy to unleash a devastating wave attack against the Separatist ranks. This immediately disrupts their assault and creates an opening for the Jedi Masters to exploit, but leaves you completely exposed and without the protection of the barrier, facing immediate counterfire.

Amplify Weakness: Focus your Force energy to exponentially increase the size and instability of the tears in the barrier. This risks its complete collapse, leaving the Jedi Masters vulnerable to a direct assault, but would create a massive energy backflow, potentially destroying the Sith Lord and crippling the Separatist forces in the immediate vicinity.

Sever Connection: Channel your Force abilities to target and disrupt the Sith Lord's connection to the barrier. This requires immense concentration, leaving you open to attack, but success would weaken the barrier significantly and potentially sever the Sith Lord's control over the Separatist forces, throwing them into disarray. It would also sever the Sith Lords connection to the Force, temporarily.

Unleash a Force Nova: Channel a blinding surge of pure Force energy, amplified by Tython's nexus, directly into the Sith Lord. Risk: It could deplete your Force reserves, leaving you vulnerable. But this is the only way!

Execute a Saber Throw & Force Push: Hurl your lightsaber towards the Sith Lord's weapon hilt, disrupting their grip, and follow with a concentrated Force Push to throw them off balance. Risk: Exposes your center, and a miscalculation could leave you weaponless.
Channel the Living Force: Focus your light side energy into the nexus, attempting to purify it and sever the Sith Lord's connection, risking a debilitating backlash if unsuccessful.

Unleash Force Lightning: Overload the Sith nexus with raw, unfettered dark side energy, aiming for immediate disruption but embracing the inherent risks of succumbing to the dark side's influence. This action grants a major attack bonus.
Intensify the Assault: Increase the flow of Force Lightning, focusing it on Vrook's mind to forcefully extract the information, risking permanent damage to his psyche.

Overload the Transfer: Focus all your Force energy into accelerating the connection, ignoring the risks. Force the Holocron to dump its entire data load into the lightsaber crystal at maximum speed, regardless of the potential for catastrophic overload. This will draw attention, but could also give you everything you need NOW.

Sever the Connection: Pull back from the Holocron, sacrificing incomplete data to safeguard your mind and body. Prepare for a final stand against the approaching Sith Lord, armed with the partial knowledge you've gained, hoping it's enough to defend the Tython Covenant.

Embrace the Darkness: Surrender to the encroaching darkness, allowing it to amplify your power and accelerate the data extraction. Risk losing yourself entirely as you delve deeper into the Holocron's secrets, potentially gaining the knowledge needed to crush the Sith Lord and reshape the future of Tython, but at the cost of your soul.

Sever the Connection and Embrace the Grey: Rejecting the constraints of both Jedi and Sith, channel the raw, untamed power flowing from the Covenant to sever all ties to the Jedi Order. Take on the mantle of a Grey Jedi, using this newfound independence to forge a new path, abandoning Tython to establish a neutral order focused on balance and understanding, accepting the consequences of your actions for the greater good.

Sacrifice Your Connection and Restore Balance: Recognizing the inherent danger of wielding the Covenant's power alone, willingly sever your own connection to the Force, channeling the remaining energy into the Jedi Temple. This act of selflessness will shield Tython from further attacks and restore balance to the Force, though it will leave you as a normal being. Guide the Jedi Order from the shadows, as a normal being, offering the experience you had with both sides of the Force, to help the Jedi learn from its mistakes and guide a path to a new enlightened era. You are now a teacher to the new generation of Jedi.

Sacrifice Your Connection: Sever your deepest bond – a memory, a skill, a belief – to fuel the Tython Covenant and unleash its full protective power, accepting the profound personal loss in exchange for the galaxy's potential salvation.

Embrace the Darkness: Surrender to your anger and despair, channeling the raw power of the Dark Side to overwhelm the Sith Lord and seize control of the Tython Covenant for yourself, accepting the path of corruption and dominance.

Focus all your Force energy into deciphering the final activation ritual, accepting the inherent risk of burning out your connection to the Force to awaken the Tython Covenant immediately and face the consequences, whatever they may be.

Sacrifice your most cherished possession, a lightsaber passed down through your family for generations, channeling its energy into the Covenant as the texts demand, hoping to appease the Force entity and unlock its full power before the Sith Lord breaches the temple.
Channel the Force, pouring your life essence into the ancient mechanism, accepting whatever sacrifice is required to activate the Tython Covenant and banish the encroaching darkness.
Seize the power, overriding the Covenant's intended function and bending its energy to your will, embracing the Dark Side as you claim Tython as your own.

Focus all your energy into a concentrated Force wave, detonating the overloaded conduits. Risk destroying the chamber and yourself, but potentially triggering the Covenant's activation or a catastrophic failure that banishes the Separatist threat.

Channel your rage and embrace the Dark Side to siphon the chaotic energy from the overloaded conduits. Corrupt the Covenant's intended purpose and transform it into a weapon to crush your enemies and cement your dominion over Tython. A successful corruption will drastically alter your destiny and lead to Sith dominion, but will lead to guaranteed control over Tython and the death of the Separatist.

Sever the Connection: Focus all your energy into cutting off the Master's connection to the Force, preventing him from aiding the Sith Lord and weakening the Separatist attack. This will either incapacitate him, revealing his allegiance openly, or allow you to escape and return to the fight.

Confront the Sith Lord: Abandon the risky mind probe and immediately engage the Sith Lord in direct combat, attempting to disrupt his command and defend the Tython Covenant. This is a gamble, but if successful, could turn the tide of the battle and protect the temple from further damage, but without any knowledge, the attack could fall short.

Unleash a Force Barrage: Abandon subtlety and unleash a disorienting Force push, followed by a rapid series of Force blasts designed to overwhelm the suspected traitor, leaving them vulnerable for interrogation or, if necessary, incapacitation. End this now.

Execute a Lightsaber Strike: With a surge of Force speed, close the distance and initiate a precise lightsaber strike aimed at disarming the Master. Aim for their weapon hand, prioritizing incapacitation over lethal force. Show your strength and take away their ability to fight, forcing them to submit to your will.

Activate the Covenant Immediately: Disregarding the Council's skepticism and the ongoing battle, channel all your Force energy into the ancient artifacts, forcing the Tython Covenant to awaken now, gambling that its raw power will repel the Separatists and answer your questions, risking unforeseen consequences and potential corruption.

Compromise with the Council: Present irrefutable evidence of the Tython Covenant and the immediate danger, demanding they reallocate resources to defend the Temple's hidden chamber while you personally lead a strike force to eliminate the Separatist leader and disrupt their attack, buying time to perform the correct ritual and make the necessary sacrifice, risking failure if the Council remains unconvinced or if you are unable to defeat the Sith Lord.

Sacrifice your connection to the Force, unleashing a wave of pure energy to permanently sever the Sith Lord's connection to Tython, banishing the Separatist fleet and ensuring the Covenant's protection for generations to come, but leaving you a mere mortal with the knowledge of what was.

Embrace the Dark Side, corrupting the Tython Covenant with your rage and ambition, seizing control of the Force nexus and unleashing a wave of dark energy that overwhelms the Sith Lord and enslaves the Separatist fleet, establishing yourself as the undisputed Dark Lord of Tython and ushering in an era of fear and domination.

Sever Connection to the Covenant: Sacrifice your link to the Tython Covenant to fully empower the Force Storm, ensuring the Separatists' annihilation but severing the planet's protective shield permanently, leaving it vulnerable to future threats.

Channel the Light: Focus all your energy into amplifying the Tython Covenant's remaining power, creating a concentrated beam of pure light to cleanse the corrupted energies and drive back the Separatists. Risk: Requires unwavering faith and may not be enough to fully defeat the Separatist forces.

Surrender: Release your grip, accepting the Covenant's call to become one with the Force, empowering the healing wave beyond its limits and ensuring Tython's lasting protection, but sacrificing your individual consciousness.

Resist: Refuse to fully relinquish control, redirecting the Covenant's healing wave to bolster your own Force abilities, eradicating the Separatist forces completely and solidifying your power as the defender of Tython, but potentially corrupting the Covenant and jeopardizing its future.

Sacrifice Everything: Pour your remaining life force into the Covenant, unleashing a wave of pure light that obliterates the Separatist forces and completely heals the Jedi Master, ensuring the Temple's safety, but leaving your own body as an empty husk. The Covenant is now fully active, but you are no more.

Sever the Connection: Cut off the flow of energy to the Jedi Master, instead redirecting the Covenant's power to amplify your own abilities. Decimate the remaining Separatist forces, claiming the Covenant's power for yourself. The Jedi Master will succumb to the darkness, but Tython will be under your control, and you will be immensely powerful.

Unleash the Storm: Surrender completely to the raw Force energy unleashed by the explosion, channeling a devastating wave of pure power to obliterate the remaining Separatist forces and the Sith Lord, accepting the risk of permanent corruption and a descent into darkness.

Sever the Connection: Fight to regain control, forcefully severing your connection to the surge of raw Force energy. Focus the Light Side of the Force and mend the Jedi Master's wounds. Then, working together, drive back the remaining Separatists, sacrificing raw power for a balanced approach.

Sacrifice: Offer your own Force essence to fully awaken the Tython Covenant, creating a wave of pure light that banishes the Sith Lord and cleanses the Temple, but leaving you weakened and forever changed.

Dominate: Seize the fractured power of the Tython Covenant for yourself, bending its energy to your will and crushing the Sith Lord with a surge of dark force. Accept the consequences of absolute power.

Feign Allegiance and Strike: Proclaim your devotion to the Sith Lord, allowing them to begin your 'training.' Bide your time, studying their weaknesses, and strike a decisive blow when they least expect it, gambling your soul on a single, devastating attack.

Unleash the Covenant's Fury: Abandon the deception and fully embrace the Tython Covenant, channeling its power to banish the Sith Lord and their forces from Tython in a blinding surge of Light, accepting whatever consequences arise from wielding such potent energy.

Embrace the Storm: Unleash the Force Storm, obliterating the Separatist forces. Witness the raw power firsthand, but accept the severing of your connection to the Tython Covenant. Decide now, what you will do with this new found power?

Sacrifice Yourself: Channel your remaining Force energy into the Tython Covenant, reinforcing its protective shield and banishing the Separatist invaders, but at the cost of your own life. Secure Tython’s safety for future generations to come.

Embrace the Void: Surrender completely to the Force, becoming one with the Tython Covenant. Channel the entirety of your life force into a final, all-encompassing barrier, turning your physical form into pure energy to contain the blast and empower the Covenant, guaranteeing its protection of Tython for millennia to come, though erasing your individual consciousness.

Sever the Connection: Reject the sacrifice. In a desperate gamble, sever your connection to the Living Force and instead draw upon the raw, untamed energy of the Cosmic Force, accepting the inherent risk of corruption. Use this raw power to siphon the explosion's energy into a newly formed conduit deep within Tython's core, stabilizing the blast and preventing its spread, but transforming you into a living conduit of immense, volatile power, forever changed and possibly consumed by the darkness you wield.
Sever the Connection: With a surge of Force energy, shatter the mental link binding the suspect to the darkness, risking their sanity to protect the Covenant's secrets. Hope they survive.

Embrace the Darkness: Seize control of the dark influence, bending it to your will, sacrificing the suspect's mind for the power to safeguard the Covenant and reshape the Jedi Order in your image. Your Destiny has now been fulfilled.
Submit completely to the Dark Side, embracing the Sith's teachings to unlock your full potential and obliterate the Separatist forces, but risking your soul to the darkness.
Sever your connection to the Force, sacrificing your powers to create a Force nullification field around Tython, permanently ending the war but at the cost of your identity as a Jedi Knight.
Annihilate the Remaining Jedi: Unleash a devastating Force storm, eradicating the last vestiges of the Jedi Order on Tython and cementing your dominion over the planet.
Subvert the Republic's Fleet: Use your newfound dark side abilities to manipulate the Republic fleet arriving to reinforce Tython. Turn them against each other and claim their ships as your own.

Embrace Oblivion: Focusing solely on the present moment, surrender to the Force spirit, willingly allowing your life force to become one with the Covenant. Feel your physical form dissolving as pure light erupts from within, engulfing the Separatists and the corrupted Jedi Master in a blinding wave.

Channel Darkness: Seize the fading connection with the Force spirit, not to relinquish it, but to redirect the unleashed energy. Wield your remaining life force to amplify your dark side abilities, turning the wave of pure energy into a torrent of corrupted power aimed at the Jedi Master who betrayed the Order. Use this dark energy to destroy your enemy and leave the rest of the Jedi for dead.

Override Systems and Initiate Emergency Departure: Utilize your Force powers to bypass the ship's lockdown protocols and execute a risky, manual takeoff, potentially damaging the vessel but guaranteeing a swift escape before the temple is completely destroyed.

Set Detonation and Sacrifice Yourself: Focus your remaining Force power into a final, devastating wave, collapsing the remaining Separatist forces near the temple, sacrificing your own life to buy time for any surviving Jedi to escape. The Tython Covenant will either prevail, or the darkness will take you with it.

Sustain the Onslaught: Pour every ounce of your being into the Force Wave, shattering the Suspect's mental barriers. Risk absolute mental collapse to expose their hidden allegiance and prevent further deceit, no matter the personal cost.

Sever the Connection: Abruptly cease the Force Wave, withdrawing from the psychic link to preserve your sanity. Forgo absolute certainty and rely on the fragmented insights gained to make a judgment. Trust your instincts and confront the Suspect directly based on what you've glimpsed, gambling on a gamble of truth or deception.

Sacrifice Your Connection: Sever your deepest personal connection to the Force – a cherished memory, a core belief, or your lightsaber – channeling that energy into the Tython Covenant to fully awaken its protective power and solidify the Jedi Order's future, even if it leaves you diminished and vulnerable.

Claim Dominion: Embrace the raw power surging through the Force nexus, crushing the Suspect and the Sith Lord, and seizing control of the Tython Covenant for yourself, bending its power to your will and forging a new destiny as the master of Tython, regardless of the cost to the Jedi Order or the Republic.

Confront the Sith Lord: Armed with the knowledge gleaned, however incomplete, and the artifacts you've gathered, initiate the final confrontation with the Sith Lord. Unleash your Force abilities, striving to break their hold on Tython and safeguard the Tython Covenant, whatever the cost.

Activate the Covenant Defenses: Foregoing a direct confrontation for now, use the artifacts to overload the Tython Covenant's ancient defense systems, unleashing a massive Force surge to repel the Separatist forces and sever the Sith Lord's connection to the planet. Prepare for the backlash as the Covenant's energy surges through you, altering your destiny.

Sever Connection: Unleash the full light of the Covenant, focusing its energy into a beam meant not to kill, but to purify. Aim for the Separatist commander, attempting to sever their connection to the dark side and offer them a path to redemption, potentially turning the tide of the battle entirely.

Embrace Darkness: Channel the Covenant's energy through your own darkness, a surge of power so intense it solidifies your commitment to the dark side. Focus this wave not on redemption, but obliteration, crushing the Separatist commander and their entire formation in a single, devastating blow, claiming Tython for your own.
Collapse, allowing the Tython Covenant's residual energy to surge through you, either healing or corrupting you based on past decisions, and unleash a final wave to vanquish the Separatist forces.
Focus your remaining strength, seizing the Sith Lord's lightsaber to impale him, permanently severing the dark side's influence on Tython but collapsing from exhaustion in the process.

Surrender Yourself: Release your connection to the Force, channeling your very essence into the Tython Covenant. Empower the ancient pact, unleashing a wave of pure light that decimates the Sith forces, ensuring Tython's safety but extinguishing your own flame.

Seize the Darkness: Reject the Force Spirit's conditions and rip the dark side energies from the Sith Lord, absorbing his power into yourself. Corrupt the Tython Covenant, transforming it into a conduit of terrifying power, crushing the Separatist forces and claiming Tython as your personal dominion.

Establish Your Reign: Unleash a wave of Force energy, crushing all opposition and solidifying your claim. Broadcast a message across Tython, declaring yourself the supreme ruler and demanding absolute obedience from all inhabitants, Jedi and Separatist alike. Let fear be the foundation of your new order.

Forge a Dark Covenant: Instead of total domination, recognize the remaining Separatist commanders' strategic value and offer them power in exchange for their loyalty. Focus your initial efforts on uncovering Tython's ancient Dark Side secrets and creating a Force nexus. The Jedi Order are allowed to survive, so you have more fun hunting them down.

Embrace the Darkness: Fully succumb to the Dark Side, solidifying your control over Tython and transforming the Jedi Temple into a monument to your power. Prepare to repel the inevitable Jedi counter-attack, forging a new Sith stronghold in the heart of the Republic.

Sever the Connection: Attempt to sever your connection to the Dark Side, channeling the last vestiges of your Light Side to purge the corruption. Accept the monumental cost: your Force abilities are significantly diminished, but Tython is saved from your dark influence, allowing the remaining Jedi to rebuild.

Unleash a Force Nova: Channel all remaining Light Side energy into a devastating Force Nova, obliterating the Sith Lord's physical form and disrupting his connection to the Dark Side nexus on Tython, but risking your own life in the process. This will leave you vulnerable, but could permanently cripple his power.

Become One with the Covenant: Merge your consciousness with the Tython Covenant itself, sacrificing your individual identity to become a living conduit for its protective energy. This will empower you with unparalleled Force abilities, allowing you to banish the Sith Lord and his influence from Tython permanently, but at the cost of your former self.
Unleash a final, focused blast of Force energy directly into the Commander's chest, shattering his armor and ending his reign of terror on Tython.
Sever the Commander's life support systems with your lightsaber, ending his life but potentially leaving the droid army to continue their assault under automated command.
Engage the Commander: Leap across the chasm created by your Force Wave, lightsaber ignited, to confront the Separatist Commander directly in a final, decisive duel.

Empower the Covenant: Channel the remaining energy into the Tython Covenant, accepting the final sacrifice and unleashing a wave of pure Force energy to eradicate the Separatist fleet and banish the Sith influence from the planet.

Stabilize Covenant: Focusing your remaining energy, attempt to purify the dark side corruption threatening to engulf the Tython Covenant, channeling your light side essence to restore balance and secure the future of the Jedi Order. The cost is severe, potentially draining your connection to the Force.

Seize Control: Embrace the dark side corruption now surging through the Tython Covenant, claiming its power for yourself. Subdue the remaining Separatist forces and solidify your dominion over Tython, establishing a new era of dark side rule. Any remnants of your former light side essence are forever extinguished.

Unleash Focus Blast: Channel all your remaining Force energy into the refined Tempest, obliterating the lead droid and severing the Separatist control over the remaining droids. The backlash strains your connection to the Force, leaving you vulnerable but victorious.

Sacrifice Force Connection: Sever your bond to the Tython Covenant, channeling its raw power directly into the Focus Blast. The droid and its controller are annihilated, but you are now cut off from the source of your strength. You must choose your final path without the protection of the Covenant, embracing the Light, the Dark, or the Grey.

Unleash the Tempest: Focus every fiber of your being, channeling your Force energy into the Tempest. Embrace the overwhelming power, knowing it will consume you, to create a final, insurmountable shield against the Separatist onslaught.

Sever the Connection: With a surge of will, sever your Force connection to the Tempest, redirecting the energy into one final, devastating blast against the lead droid. Save yourself, but leave the Jedi exposed to more danger.
Unleash the Tempest: Channel the full force of the dark side, obliterating the remaining Separatist forces and solidifying your claim. Any Jedi that stands defiant will be made an example of.
Corrupt the Covenant: Twist the Tython Covenant to your will, imbuing it with dark side energy. Transform the Temple into a nexus of Sith power, attracting dark side followers from across the galaxy.

Unleash the Blade: Focus all the Covenant's energy into your lightsaber, creating a blade of pure Force. Charge forward, gambling everything on a single, decisive strike against the Sith Lord, hoping to shatter his defenses and end the battle now. But know that such an outpouring of energy could overwhelm your connection to the Force, leaving you vulnerable or worse.

Sever the Connection: Reject the Tython Covenant and embrace the Dark Side. Channel all of the Force, from Tython and the Covenant, into an explosion of pure Darkness. Surrender yourself fully to the dark side and use it to destroy the Sith Lord.

Unleash the Storm: Channel the Tython Covenant's raw energy directly into the Sith Lord, unleashing a blinding storm of pure Force. Sacrifice your connection to the Covenant to obliterate their physical form, ending the immediate threat but severing the Jedi's link to Tython's power.

Sever the Nexus: Focus the Covenant's energy inward, creating a Force Barrier around the Jedi Temple, while simultaneously severing the dark side nexus of the Sith Lord. Purge the darkness from Tython, banishing them from the planet, leaving it heavily scarred but untainted, but also trapping the Jedi on Tython, unable to leave, guarding against any future threats.

Unleash Covenant's Fury: Focus all of the Tython Covenant's immense energy into a concentrated blast aimed directly at the Separatist flagship, obliterating it and crippling their forces. Prepare for a surge of raw power that could leave you drained, but Tython momentarily safe.

Sever the Connection: Break the Tython Covenant's link, cutting off the flow of power to the Separatist forces and yourself. This would cause immediate chaos and confusion on both sides, preventing the blast but potentially creating enough disruption to rout the enemy. The energy flowing within you could shatter you into a thousand pieces.

Unleash the Light: Focus all your energy and the Tython Covenant's power into a blinding beam, directly targeting the Sith Lord. Overwhelm them with pure light, severing their connection to the dark side and potentially destroying their physical form. Hope that the blast doesn't destroy the Covenant.

Contain the Darkness: Instead of outright destroying the Sith Lord, weave a Force cocoon of pure light, trapping them within a prison of the Tython Covenant's energy. Isolate the dark side corruption, preventing it from spreading and allowing the Covenant to slowly purify the contained evil, but you may destroy the Sith Lord.

Unleash a torrent of pure Force light, obliterating the Sith Lord and severing the dark side nexus on Tython, knowing it will consume your physical form but preserve your consciousness within the Covenant.

Draw upon the dark side energy coursing through the Sith Lord, absorbing their power into yourself and becoming a conduit for both light and darkness, a being of ultimate balance, defying both Jedi and Sith dogma.

Unleash a Force Storm: Consume the remnants of light within Tython, creating a vortex of pure dark energy that obliterates the Separatist fleet and cements your dominion, forging a new Sith Order from the ashes of the old. Ignore the warnings, the force is yours.

Sever the Force Nexus: Tap into the dark side nexus of Tython. Sever the connection with the light side and let the dark side overwhelm everything. Establish a stronghold. A beacon for all things dark side. Create a haven of power where you control who can and cannot use the Force.

Unleash the Covenant: Channel all your remaining energy into the Tython Covenant, overloading its protective matrix to create a massive Force wave. This will obliterate the Sith Lord and their ritual, but the Covenant itself will be destroyed, leaving Tython vulnerable in the future.

Embrace the Darkness: Accept the Sith Lord's power, absorbing their life force into yourself. This will instantly empower you, granting immense strength and control over the Dark Side, but corrupting your soul and solidifying your path as a Dark Lord of the Sith. Use this power to drive back the remaining separatist forces and claim Tython as your own.

Sacrifice Self: Surrender your physical form to become one with the Covenant, amplifying its power to banish the Sith Lord and sever the Dark Side nexus, ensuring the Jedi Order's survival but ending your mortal existence.

Embrace Darkness: Seize the Dark Side nexus, overwhelming the Sith Lord with your own power. Bind the Covenant to your will, becoming the supreme ruler of Tython and ushering in an age of Sith dominance, forever altering the destiny of the Jedi and the Republic.

Unleash the Light: Sever your connection to the Force, channeling every last spark of your being into a blinding wave of pure light. Obliterate the Sith Lord and seal the Tython Covenant forever, safeguarding the Jedi Order but extinguishing your own exceptional abilities and connection to the Force.

Refuse the Sacrifice: Reject the cost, clinging to your Force connection. Instead, channel the raw power of the Tython Covenant directly into your lightsaber, gambling on a final, desperate strike against the Sith Lord, risking the corruption of the Covenant and the potential failure of your attack.

Unleash a Force Storm: Draw upon the raw, untamed power of the Dark Side, unleashing a devastating Force Storm that engulfs the Sith Lord and the Tython Covenant, ensuring your absolute dominion over Tython and corrupting the sacred site beyond repair.

Corrupt the Covenant: Seize control of the Tython Covenant, twisting its protective energies into weapons of pure darkness. Channel this corrupted power to overwhelm the Sith Lord, then reshape the Covenant to serve your will, transforming Tython into a fortress of the Sith and a beacon of fear in the Republic.

Sacrifice Yourself: Focusing all your energy, you become a conduit for the Tython Covenant. Unleash a blinding wave of light that vaporizes the Sith Lord and their forces, ensuring Tython's eternal safety, but at the cost of your own physical form. Your consciousness merges with the planet, forever guarding it against future threats.

Sever the Connection: Realizing the risk, you forcibly sever your connection to the Covenant mid-surge, redirecting its power to amplify a final, devastating lightsaber strike. You cripple the Sith Lord, leaving them vulnerable and weakened, but the Covenant's backlash threatens to overwhelm you both in a maelstrom of raw Force energy.

Channel Severance: Focus every fiber of your being, drawing upon both Light and Dark energies within you, and unleash a concentrated wave of Force energy directly into the Sith Lord. Overload their connection to the Force nexus, severing their power source at the cost of your own life force.

Sacrifice Bond: Extend your hand, reaching into the Force Nexus and severing your connection. As the Sith Lord is connected to the same Nexus, the Force Lord will be severed alongside you, in your final moments of darkness. Sacrifice your own connection to the nexus to sever his as well.

Unleash EVERYTHING: Focus all of your Force energy, Light and Dark, into a single, overwhelming blast directed at the Sith Lord. Sacrifice your connection to the Tython Covenant and risk shattering the Temple itself for a chance to obliterate the Sith threat permanently.

Balance the Nexus: Attempt to channel both the Light and Dark energies swirling within you to create a harmonic convergence within the Tython Nexus. Focus on stabilizing the Force energies, not destroying the Sith Lord. Risk being consumed by the raw power, but potentially create a lasting peace on Tython.

Unleash Covenant's Light: Channel every fiber of your being into the Tython Covenant, amplifying its light to an overwhelming surge, severing the Sith Lord's connection and banishing the encroaching darkness, knowing it could shatter your physical form in the process.

Embrace the Void: Suppress your Light Side, opening yourself to the nexus's raw power. Overwhelm the Sith Lord by becoming a conduit of pure Force energy, twisting the nexus to your will and dominating him with its chaotic strength, risking your soul to the darkness.

Unleash all Force Lightning: Channel every ounce of your Force power into a concentrated blast of lightning, aiming to sever the Sith Lord's connection to the Force. Risk burning yourself out to cripple their abilities and disrupt the Separatist command, even if it means leaving yourself vulnerable.

Sacrifice the Covenant: Sever your connection to the Tython Covenant, channeling its immense protective power into one final, overwhelming wave of pure Force energy aimed at eradicating the Sith Lord and scattering the Separatist forces. Accept the permanent loss of the Covenant's protection, but ensure the immediate safety of Tython and cripple the Separatists, at the cost of the future.

Unleash the Storm: Channel all your remaining Force energy into a devastating Force Storm, engulfing the Sith Lord and the collapsing Temple in raw power, sacrificing your own connection to the Light Side to ensure the Sith's destruction, potentially saving Tython but condemning yourself.

Embrace the Covenant: Accept the Tython Covenant's final demand - sacrifice your physical form and become one with the Force, unleashing a wave of pure light that banishes the Sith Lord and seals the Temple's ruins, ensuring Tython's eternal protection but ending your own life as a Jedi Knight.

Surrender: Release your hold on your physical form, becoming one with the Tython Covenant. Let your consciousness flow into the Force, amplifying the Covenant's power to permanently sever the Sith Lord's connection to Tython and banish them into the void.

Resist: Cling to your mortal coil, refusing to fully merge with the Covenant. Instead, focus your remaining life force into a final, overwhelming blast of pure Force energy, channeling it through your lightsaber to strike down the Sith Lord. Risk corrupting the Covenant but preserve a sliver of your existence.
Consolidate Power: Immediately begin purging any remaining Jedi loyalists and Separatist sympathizers from Tython, establishing a reign of fear and solidifying your absolute control.

Broadcast Domination: Unleash a Force wave across the galaxy, announcing your ascension and challenging any who dare oppose your reign, drawing the attention of both the Republic and the remaining Sith Lords.

Surrender: Open yourself completely to the Covenant, pouring every ounce of your remaining life force and faith into it. Accept whatever fate awaits, trusting in the Force to guide the unleashed energy, even if it means your own destruction.

Resist: Fight to maintain control, channeling the Covenant's energy but forcefully directing it through your own body, shielding yourself from its raw power while simultaneously unleashing it upon the Sith Lord. Risk burning yourself out to ensure the Sith Lord's defeat and the protection of the Covenant.

Unleash the Storm: Channel the Disruptive Field into a devastating wave of dark energy, obliterating the Sith Lord and solidifying your control over Tython. Let the raw power surge through you, welcoming the corruption that comes with it. Hear the echoes of a future Sith Empire begin to rise.

Forge a Dark Covenant: Instead of outright destroying the Sith Lord, bind their essence to you, becoming a vessel for both your light and their darkness. Offer them a place within your soul, forging a new order based on power, not just destruction. Accept the alliance that the Sith are bound to you, thus making yourself an even more powerful Force user.

Unleash Final Stand: Channel all your remaining Force energy into a single, devastating wave, obliterating the Separatist forces at the cost of permanently severing your connection to the Force, ensuring Tython's immediate safety but leaving you vulnerable.

Embrace the Void: Surrender to the encroaching darkness, absorbing the Separatist's destructive energy into yourself, becoming a conduit for their aggression and turning it back upon them with terrifying amplified power, ensuring victory but forever corrupting your soul.

Dominate the Weak: Forcefully subjugate the remaining Separatist forces, bending them to your will and solidifying your control over Tython as the first act of your new Sith reign, ensuring no resistance remains to challenge your authority.

Siphon the Covenant: Absorb the last vestiges of light from the Tython Covenant, amplifying your dark power to unimaginable levels, making yourself an unstoppable force capable of crushing any future opposition and permanently tainting Tython.

Unleash Covenant Energy: Channel all remaining Force reserves, drawing upon the Tython Covenant itself, and unleash a wave of pure energy to obliterate the Sith Lord, accepting whatever personal cost may come with such raw power.

Sever the Connection: Realizing the Covenant is too dangerous to control, sever your connection to the Force entirely, creating a void that disrupts the Sith Lord's power and leaves them vulnerable. Accept the sacrifice of your abilities to ensure the galaxy's survival.

Unleash the Storm: Focus all your remaining Force energy into a concentrated blast, targeting the Sith Lord's immediate surroundings. Sacrifice any remaining defensive abilities to maximize the attack's power, hoping to overwhelm them before they can recover.

Weave the Deception: Tap into the chaotic energy of the battle and create a Force Illusion of yourself charging head-on. Use this distraction to flank the Sith Lord, aiming to sever their connection to the Force with a precise strike to their nexus point.

Dominate Their Will: Instead of destroying them, crush the Sith Lord's will, forcing them to kneel before you. Bind them to your service, turning them into a powerful pawn in your growing dark empire, proving your supremacy and beginning your conquest of the galaxy.
Channel the Covenant: Pour all remaining Force energy into the ancient ritual, disregarding the risk of complete burnout. Unleash the full, raw power of the Tython Covenant now!

Weave a Sacrifice: Focus on your strongest Force connection – be it a memory, a person, or a deeply held belief – and sever it completely, offering it as the final key to unlock the Covenant's power. Accept the profound loss to safeguard Tython.
Unleash the Covenant: Focusing your will, shatter the lightsaber upon the altar, channeling its concentrated energy into the Tython Covenant and praying for the Force entity's blessing.
Resist the Sacrifice: Defy the ancient texts and refuse to destroy your family's legacy. Instead, attempt to bind your own life force directly to the Covenant, bypassing the traditional ritual.

Surrender fully to the Force, severing all ties to your past and present self, becoming a pure conduit for the Covenant's power, knowing it might mean your memories, personality, and even your physical form will be consumed.

Resist the complete sacrifice, attempting to control the flow of your life force, channeling the Covenant’s power but retaining a sliver of your identity, risking a corruption of the process that could have dire consequences.
Unleash a Force Storm, corrupting the Covenant's light and bathing Tython in darkness, solidifying your claim and crushing all resistance.
Sever the connection to the Light Side entirely, sacrificing your former self to fully embody the dark power of the Covenant, becoming a being of pure dark energy.

Unleash the Surge: Channel every ounce of your being into the Force, accepting the risk of annihilation. Detonate the conduits with a focused blast, gambling that the Covenant's power will respond and obliterate the Separatist forces in a blinding wave of light.

Sever the Connection: Override the Force surge, diverting the excess energy into a self-shield. Sacrifice the Covenant's immediate activation to ensure your survival and the preservation of the Temple. Contain the blast, then seek out a more controlled method of awakening its power.

Unleash a Force Storm: Channel your rage into a devastating Force Storm, directly targeting the Covenant's core. Overload its protective matrix with pure dark energy, twisting its purpose into a weapon of annihilation. Watch as the Separatist forces are consumed in the storm's fury, your power solidifying your claim to Tython.

Sever the Light: With a surge of dark power, sever the remaining threads of Light within the Covenant. Corrupt the conduits with your darkness, reshaping its core essence. As the light fades, seize the energy matrix within the Temple, and transform it into a beacon of fear. Siphon that power into your body, overwhelming it with dark energy, and transforming into the ruler of Tython. The transformation will kill the Separatist Lord.

Unleash a Force Sever: Channel all your rage and focus into a concentrated Force Sever, ripping away the Master's connection with the Force. The backlash risks overwhelming you both, potentially collapsing his connection, but at the cost of your own focus, leaving you vulnerable to the approaching Sith Lord.

Sever and Escape: Perform a quick Force Sever of the Masters connections, then capitalize on the disruption, using a burst of Force Speed to escape the chamber and rejoin the battle. Abandoning the Master to his fate and leaving the Tython Covenant.

Unleash the Covenant's Fury: Channel the full power of the Tython Covenant into a devastating Force wave, sacrificing your connection to the Force to obliterate the Sith Lord and his fleet, ensuring the Temple's survival but leaving you powerless and vulnerable.

Sever the Dark Side Nexus: Focus all your remaining energy into severing the dark side nexus the Sith Lord is using to amplify his power, disrupting the Tython Covenant's connection, then confront him directly. This risks corrupting the Covenant and plunging Tython into darkness, but also presents a chance to destroy the Sith Lord permanently and perhaps save the Covenant later.

Unleash the Covenant's Fury: Focusing your will, channel the full power of the Tython Covenant. Unleash its stored energy in a concentrated blast against the Sith Lord, knowing it could either obliterate them or shatter the very foundations of the temple. Prepare for the consequences.

Sever the Connection: Recognizing the danger, attempt to sever the Sith Lord's connection to the Dark Side entirely. Using a forbidden Jedi technique, try to purify their spirit, potentially redeeming them but risking your own corruption or the severing of your connection to the Force. Prepare for either redemption or utter darkness.

Unleash a Force Wave: Channel the full power of the Force, Light and Dark, into a devastating wave. Overwhelm the Master's defenses, shattering their connection to the Force and leaving them vulnerable to your judgment, ensuring a swift end to this conflict.

Sever the Bond: Focus all your energy on severing the Force bond between the Master and the Tython Covenant. Disconnect them from the source of their power, rendering them powerless and exposing the truth behind their actions to all present, forever altering the course of the Jedi Order.

Sacrifice Your Connection: Sever your deepest bond to the Force, offering it as the catalyst to awaken the Tython Covenant immediately. Accept the permanent weakening of your connection to the Force, but unleashing the Covenant's full protective power on Tython, expelling the Separatist forces and preventing corruption, but forever altering your Force Abilities.

Seize the Dark Power: Embrace the raw, untamed energy of the Tython Covenant, channeling your deepest fears and angers to bend it to your will. Risk corrupting the Covenant and becoming a Dark Lord, but gain the power to crush the Separatists and reshape Tython in your image, but the visions will persist.

Rally the strike force and confront the Sith Lord head-on, gambling that a swift victory will buy the Jedi Council enough time to reinforce the Temple's defenses and prepare the Covenant ritual, even if it means facing the full might of the Separatist fleet alone.

Divert crucial forces to immediately reinforce the hidden chamber and begin the Covenant ritual yourself, abandoning the direct assault on the Separatist leader, hoping the Council will eventually understand the gravity of the situation and provide support while desperately trying to buy time, risking the Separatist victory if you are too late.

Focus your remaining will. Accepting the inevitable fading of your Force connection, channel the last vestiges of your power into a final, focused strike. Aim not for the Sith Lord's body, but for the nexus point of their Dark Side energy, severing their tie to Tython and unleashing the Covenant's protective wave.

Embrace the fading light. Knowing your connection to the Force is about to be severed, accept the sacrifice and allow the Tython Covenant to flow through you completely. Surrender your will to the ancient power, becoming a conduit for its protective energy, unleashing it upon the Sith Lord and the Separatist fleet, ensuring Tython's safety.
Unleash a Force Storm, obliterating the remaining Jedi resistance on Tython and solidifying your reign of terror, ensuring no Light can challenge your dominion.

Extend your dark influence outward, dispatching the enslaved Separatist fleet to conquer key Republic worlds, initiating a swift and brutal campaign to destabilize the Republic and prepare the galaxy for Sith rule.
